Description: Rescuing Emma Boscastle, an instructor at her London academy for young ladies, from the unwanted attentions of a scoundrel during a wedding she had organized, injured rogue Adrian Ruxley finds himself recuperating under Emma's roof and tempting the proper young lady into a seductive display of impropriety.
